channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Blockchain Keystore
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Blockchain Keystore

item.title: CVE-2023-21507|2024-08-02T09:44:01.046Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20blockchain%20keystore
item.description: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability while processing BC_TUI_CMD_SEND_RESOURCE_DATA_ARRAY command in bc_tui trustlet from Samsung Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.12.1 allows local attacker to read arbitrary memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-21506|2024-08-02T09:44:01.307Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20blockchain%20keystore
item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability while processing BC_TUI_CMD_SEND_RESOURCE_DATA_ARRAY command in bc_tui trustlet from Samsung Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.12.1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-21509|2024-08-02T09:44:01.176Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20blockchain%20keystore
item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability while processing BC_TUI_CMD_UPDATE_SCREEN in bc_tui trustlet from Samsung Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.12.1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-21511|2024-08-02T09:44:01.474Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20blockchain%20keystore
item.description: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability while processing CMD_COLDWALLET_BTC_SET_PRV_UTXO in bc_core trustlet from Samsung Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.12.1 allows local attacker to read arbitrary memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-21510|2024-08-02T09:44:01.116Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20blockchain%20keystore
item.description: Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability while processing BC_TUI_CMD_UPDATE_SCREEN in bc_tui trustlet from Samsung Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.12.1 allows local attacker to read arbitrary memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-21508|2024-08-02T09:44:01.056Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20blockchain%20keystore
item.description: Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability while processing BC_TUI_CMD_SEND_RESOURCE_DATA command in bc_tui trustlet from Samsung Blockchain Keystore prior to version 1.3.12.1 allows local attacker to execute arbitrary code.
